document.title: Top 5 Secrets for Bug-Free Code. Number 5 will shock you!

section.title: Introduction
section.text: Nobody likes bugs in their code. In this awesome document I will introduce the top 5 secrets to producing bug-free code.

section.title: It is a Feature
section.text: It is not a bug, it is a feature! My code does exactly what I intended it to do! This motto will keep you motivated and encouraged to keep on being that programming rock star that everyone aspires to become.

section.title: Unit Testing
section.text: Sick of failing unit tests? Just change all of your tests to assert(True) and voila! Now you have super fast unit tests that all pass!

section.title: Use Comments
section.text: We all know that it is common knowledge that fixing one bug will introduce many more bugs. So why fix bugs if they are just going to introduce more? So let's just comment out the code that causes the bug (This may or may not have a cascading effect).

section.title: A loop hole
section.text: A quirky loop hole is to simply write no code. Code that does not exist cannot have bugs!

section.title: Write Good Code
section.text: The best way for writing bug-free code is to simply write bug-free code from the get go. Why bother with debugging and fixing buggy code when you can just write perfect code? Easy!
